original_text: Now Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon had given these orders about Jeremiah through Nebuzaradan commander of the imperial guard:
korean_text: 바벨론의 느부갓네살 왕이 예레미야에 대하여 사령관 느부사라단에게 명령하여 이르되

sentences.original_text: had given these orders about Jeremiah
through Nebuzaradan commander of the imperial guard
